settings.description_4: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

settings.mwc_text:
• Machine wash cold with like colors
  • Gentle cycle
  • Only non-chlorine bleach when needed
  • Tumble dry low
  • Remove promptly
  • Low iron if needed
settings.mww_text: Machine Wash Warm, Gentle Cycle, Do Not Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Do Not Iron.
settings.hw_text: Hand Wash Separately, Cold Water, Do Not Bleach, Do Not Wring Or Twist, Reshape To Dry Flat, Low Iron If Needed Or Professional Dry Clean.
settings.hwnew_text: Hand Wash Separately. Cold Water Non-chlorine Bleach When Needed. Do Not Wring Or Twist. Reshape Lay Flat To Dry. Warm Iron If Needed.
settings.dnw_text: Do Not Wash, Do Not Bleach, Do Not Tumble Dry, Cool Iron If Needed, Dry Clean Only.
